title: NON-VERBAL HYPNOTIC TECHNIQUES: Part 2 / Hypnotic Fascination, ASMR sounds, hypnotic induction
description:
This is the second part of this video series. The previous video, you can watch here: https://studio.youtube.com/video/U36kzxj7jNs/edit  Dr. Paret's students from his non-verbal hypnosis masterclass Magnetic Path are doing exercise for bettering the techniques they learned. Using Fascination - the power of the gaze, ASMR sounds, quantum hypnosis and magnetism, the subject enters in a deep trance state of hypnotic induction. The subject enters in state of catalepsy. Waking up the hypnotized is feeling liberated and positively transformed. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
